Tierion (TNT)  1. Used to anchor data to the blockchain to create timestamps of data. 2. Microsoft partnership (word on the street is Tierion is being tested with LinkedIn to create attestations of credentials on resume). 3. Phillips partnership to keep track of maintenance data of MRI machines. 4. Just hired new head of Marketing and hiring 2 senior developers. 5. Can anchor data into any blockchain (right now Ethereum and Bitcoin but capable to incorporate into any chain) 6. Node reward system so you can accurately calculate how much you can earn running nodes while holding this gem of a token.  Tierion is also in the Decentralized Identity Foundation (www.identity.foundation) with IOTA, IBM, Microsoft, Civic, Gem.  Wayne Vaughn (CEO of Tierion) is a chair on the Decentralized Identity Foundation for Attestations and Reputation.
